name: Yahtzee (itch) (Kimberlyy.)
description:
(2021)

Gameplay Rules:
Yahtzee is a game played with five 6-sided dice. Players take turns rolling the dice and trying to get certain type of rolls, each with an assigned point value. Players are allowed a total of three rolls, with any subset of dice capable of being set aside at each roll. 

Requirements:

AcesAt least one aceTwosAt least one twoThreesAt least one threeFoursAt least one fourFivesAt least one fiveSixesAt least one sixThree of a kindAt least three dice of the same numberFour of a kindAt least four dice of the same numberFull houseTwo dice of one number and three dice of another Small straightFour numbers in a rowLarge straightFive numbers in a rowYahtzeeFive dice of the same numberChanceAny roll

Points:

AcesSum of 1sTwosSum of 2sThreesSum of 3sFoursSum of 4sFivesSum of 5sSixesSum of 6sThree of a kindSum  of all diceFour of a kindSum of all diceFull house25Small straight30Large straight40Yahtzee50ChanceSum of all dice

In addition to points score by obtaining various rolls of the dice, 35 points are awarded if the total score from this first six categories are at least 63 points.

When a player gets another Yahtzee within the same game, 100 extra points are awarded in the Yahtzee column for each extra Yahtzee.

You are also able to 'remove' a field when you do not match the requirements of the remaining fields. You will get 0 points on the chosen field.

Controls:
Mouse - Navigate through the application; Interact with buttons
ESC - Pause/Unpause game 
M - Mute/Unmute sound

Motivation:
I am graduated as a Gamedeveloper and now I am following a study Computer Science on a higher degree. My focus is to program and learn as much as I can in my free time. Beside that, I wanted to make this digital game because that I like to play this game physically. Feel free to give me some feedback.
